com.android.server.accessibility

Class AccessibilityManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • IAccessibilityManager.Stub
      • com.android.server.accessibility.AccessibilityManagerService

  • public class AccessibilityManagerService
extends IAccessibilityManager.Stub
    This class is instantiated by the system as a system level service and can be accessed only by the system. The task of this service is to be a centralized event dispatch for AccessibilityEvents generated across all processes on the device. Events are dispatched to AccessibilityServices.
